Add an event set to the library

1 Click the Events button .

Or on the Template menu, click Events.

2 Click the Event Set tab.

3 In the Available Event Sets box, select one or more event sets to add and then click >>.

To select a group of events, you can hold down the shift or control key while clicking. shift allows you to make adjacent selections; ctrl allows you to select non-adjacent events.

(To create a new event set, click New then follow the instructions in the section Event Sets and Macros.)

4 Click Close.
